channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Team Foundation Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Team Foundation Server

item.title: CVE-2019-0868|2024-08-04T17:58:59.892Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Server do not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0866, CVE-2019-0867, CVE-2019-0870, CVE-2019-0871.
